_header: An open showing of Christs lordship worthiness
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — three monorhyming lines

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
An Opun schewynge of cristes lordeschepe worthinesse An Grete
                    dysyreyg of cristus frenchype goudlynesse An opun knowlecheyng of here owne
                    schenchepe febulnesse
